content:
I've created a PR #2 for the roc-lang/examples repository. It adds two Examples to seed the repository and includes the basic structure such as the roc app to build the site and instructions etc.

I have tried to capture future ideas/features in a single ROADMAP.md file for now. These should probably become Issues if we decide this is the right direction to go for this repository. Also the styles need a some attention, but they are good enough to get the basic intent across.

I would really appreciate any feedback or comments.
@Luke Boswell awesome! I should be able to review today
